hero.title:
Make AI Prompt Development
More Efficient and Professional
hero.subtitle:
A one-stop prompt management platform designed for AI developers and content creators
Significantly improving development efficiency and quality through intelligent editors, automated evaluation, and team collaboration features

features.title: Powerful Features, Professional Experience
features.subtitle: Comprehensively enhance your prompt development workflow

smartEditor.title: Smart Prompt Editor
smartEditor.description: Professional prompt creation and editing environment with syntax highlighting, real-time preview, and version control

dataManagement.title: Dataset Management
dataManagement.description: Easily manage test datasets with batch import, visual preview, and intelligent annotation

autoEvaluation.title: Automated Evaluation
autoEvaluation.description: Multi-dimensional evaluation system supporting exact matching, semantic similarity, LLM judgment, and other evaluation methods

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Multi-user collaborative workspace with permission management, tagging system, and bookmark features

evaluationMethods.title: Multi-dimensional Evaluation System
evaluationMethods.subtitle: Support 8+ evaluation methods to comprehensively verify prompt effects

useCases.title: Suitable for Multiple Scenarios
useCases.subtitle: No matter what field you're in, PromptLab can help you succeed

aiDevelopment.title: AI Product Development
aiDevelopment.description: Develop high-quality prompts for AI applications, ensuring accuracy and consistency of model outputs

contentCreation.title: Content Creation
contentCreation.description: Optimize prompt strategies for creative writing, marketing copy, technical documentation, and other scenarios

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Build professional prompts for data analysis and report generation to improve analysis efficiency and quality

education.title: Education & Training
education.description: Develop teaching assistant prompts for online education, training courses, and knowledge Q&A systems

testimonials.title: User Feedback
testimonials.subtitle: See how other users evaluate PromptLab

user1.name: Li Ming
user1.content: PromptLab helped our team improve prompt development efficiency by 300%, and quality control is also more strict and reliable.

user2.name: Wang Xiaohong
user2.content: The evaluation system is very comprehensive, and multiple evaluation methods allow us to verify prompt effects from different perspectives.

user3.name: Zhang Qiang
user3.content: The team collaboration feature is great, now the entire team can efficiently participate in prompt optimization work.

callToAction.title: Ready to Boost Your AI Prompt Development Efficiency?
callToAction.subtitle: Join thousands of developers and start your professional prompt development journey now

footer.description: Professional AI prompt development and management platform, providing efficient prompt engineering solutions for developers and creators.

The system will generate a professional data analysis prompt based on your configuration.
The generated prompt will include the dataset structure information and return analysis results according to your defined output format.
You can further customize and optimize the analysis logic in the prompt editor.
